comment.author: 88027314@N06
comment._content:
Yo quisiera dejar de confundir a Mary Douglas con la otra Mary Douglas, ambas antropólogas, una hizo investigaciones interesantes sobre los símbolos, que es la que a mi  me interesa, entre ellos Simbolos naturales y Estilos de Pensar. 
Me pueden sacar de la duda por favor?
Ana Flores

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Dear Doctora Anita, The Mary Douglas you are interested in is not the Mary Douglas in this portrait here. The Mary Douglas you're interested in is this woman: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Douglas Good luck on your search. Best, Effie, Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: I don't think I need to point out how important the work of these two hard working scientists was.  Incredible.  And, their children.  The fields of human origins, evolutionary biology, anthropology, archeology, psychology were immensely enriched by their findings.  They encouraged others such as Donald Johannsen.
